main event: A military observer witnessed an unidentified object moving at high speed in Santiago, Chile on 28 March 1950.
interesting points: The object was observed moving from south to north at an extreme rate of speed., The observer stated the object appeared more white than any other color., The witness attempted to capture the object on camera but it was gone by the time he returned., Many people in downtown Santiago were also looking at the sky at the time of the sighting., The report speculated that residents may have mistaken the object for the planet Venus.
sighted object: one unidentified object in the sky
witness description: Master Sergeant returning to the U.S. Embassy
